creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore W. Bennett
provenance:
Wrzowecz collection, Prague, Czechoslovakia, until 1723. Frederick Augustus II, "The Strong", Elector of Saxony and King of Poland [d. 1733]. [1] Kurfuerstliche Kunstkammer (later the Dresden Gallery), Dresden, Germany from 1750 though 1925.[2] Members of the Saxon Royal Family of Wettin, Halle an de Saale, Germany.[3] (Rosenberg and Stiebel, New York, New York, by 1958); Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Bennett, Minneapolis, Minnesota, by 1959; gift to MIA in 1959.

[1] Inventory no. 1451.

[2]According to correspondence in the curatorial file from Gerald Stiebel.
 
[3] At a later date, the painting went to Ireland through the Wettin family.
title: Landscape with Peasants
